body_html:
As @alanpurple mentioned, and as documented at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows
Our prebuilt binaries are built for cuda 9.0.
The sources can run on cuda 9.2, but you just need to build from sources tourself.
According to our discussions, we will probably jump straight to cuda 10.

body:
As @alanpurple mentioned, and as documented at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows
Our prebuilt binaries are built for cuda 9.0.
The sources can run on cuda 9.2, but you just need to build from sources tourself.
According to our discussions, we will probably jump straight to cuda 10.
